name: stockprice
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool indian_stock_exchange_api.
Tool description: API for Indian Stock Exchange BSE/NSE.
Contact me at: vuesdata@gmail.com or visit https://www.vuesdata.com for building custom spiders or custom requests.
API description: Enter the SYMBOL such as TATAMOTORS, M&M etc as a parameter at the endpoint and it will give your the Live Price updates from exchange.

symbol.description: The stock symbol for which to fetch the live price (e.g., TATAMOTORS, M&M).
